CustomField.formula: If( Staff_Courteous_and_Helpful__c =5, "Strongly Agree", If( Staff_Courteous_and_Helpful__c =4, "Agree", If( Staff_Courteous_and_Helpful__c =3, "Neutral", If( Staff_Courteous_and_Helpful__c =2, "Disagree", If( Staff_Courteous_and_Helpful__c =1, "Strongly Disagree","")))))
CustomField.label: Staff Courteous and Helpful Score
